mapper.update: update t_experience_bid_account set time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, balance = #{balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, freeze = #{freeze,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, last_receive_time = #{lastReceiveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, count = #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, every_grant = #{everyGrant,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, time, user_id, amount, balance, freeze, last_receive_time, count, every_grant from t_experience_bid_account
